title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. A, Guardianship Forms (Family Court Act Article 6; S.C.P.A.; Social Services Law Section 384-B), form 6-4 - Waiver of process, renunciation or consent to (letters of guardianship) (standby guardianship)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. A, Guardianship Forms (Family Court Act Article 6; S.C.P.A.; Social Services Law Section 384-B), form 6-4 - Waiver of process, renunciation or consent to (letters of guardianship) (standby guardianship)

State Regulations

Secs. 661 F.C.A: Form 6-4
1703, 1726 S.C.P.A. (Guardianship of a

Minor)
9/92
FAMILY COURT OF THE STATE OF NEW
YORK
COUNTY OF ________
________
Proceedings for the Appointment of
(Guardian) Docket No. ________
(Standby Guardian) of the

Person[FN1]
WAIVER OF PROCESS, of RENUNCIATION OR
CONSENT TO (LETTERS
________ a Minor OF GUARDIANSHIP)
(STANDBY GUARDIANSHIP)
________
The undersigned ________, whose
domiciliary address is: (State street, city, village or town, county and
state)
____________
____________
and whose interest in the above-entitled
proceeding is as follows: (check appropriate interest)
() Parent of the above-named Minor. () Grandparent of the above-named

Minor. () Other: (Specify)
hereby personally appears in the ________
Court of ________ County and (renounces all rights to Letters of Guardianship
of the person of said Minor) (and) (waives the issuance and service of process
in this matter) (and) consents that ________ be appointed the (Guardian)
(Standby Guardian) [FN2] of the person of said Minor (and that Letters of

Guardianship may be granted to said person or to any other person entitled
thereto without notice to the undersigned.)
______________
(Signature)
[FN1] May be used in proceedings for
appointment of a Guardian or Standby Guardian of the person of a Minor; delete
inapplicable provisions. [FN2] May be used in proceedings for
appointment of a Guardian or Standby Guardian of the person of a Minor; delete
inapplicable provisions. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. A, Guardianship Forms
(Family Court Act Article 6; S.C.P.A.; Social Services Law Section 384-B), form
6-4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
